external_games.name: Heroes & Generals - US Soldier Pack: Heavy Tanker

name: Heroes & Generals: US Soldier Pack - Heavy Tanker
summary: This Soldier Pack includes a Tank Crew Soldier with a Heavy Tank arsenal, these 3 colossus warmachines are composed of hardened steel and explosive gunpowder. They will take on any armored vehicle used in World War 2 and suppress all enemy infantry in its area.
